Operation 'get_/majorProjects' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Original summary is a noun phrase rather than action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about response format (array) and use cases. Enhanced version specifies the action, response structure, and provides context for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: The Major Projects endpoint returns details of all of the major projects defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all major projects defined in WorkBC's Job Board. Returns an array of major project objects, each containing an id and caption. Use this to populate major project filters or reference data for job searches.
data.reasoning: Original summary is a noun phrase rather than action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about response format (array) and use cases. Enhanced version specifies the action, response structure, and provides context for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: The Job Types endpoint returns details of all of the job types defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all job types defined in WorkBC's Job Board. Returns an array of job type objects, each containing an id and caption. Use this to populate job type filters or reference data for job searches.
data.reasoning: Original summary is a noun phrase rather than action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about response format (array) and use cases. Enhanced version specifies the action, response structure, and provides context for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: The Regions endpoint returns details of all of the regions defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all regions within B.C. defined in WorkBC's Job Board. Returns an array of region objects, each containing an id and caption. Use this to populate region filters or reference data for geographic job searches.
data.reasoning: Original summary is a noun phrase rather than action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about response format (array), geographic scope (B.C.), and use cases. Enhanced version specifies the action, response structure, geographic context, and provides guidance for AI agent usage.

message: Operation 'get_/Industries' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Original summary is a noun phrase rather than action-oriented. Description mentions hierarchical structure but lacks clarity about response format and nesting. Enhanced version specifies the action, clarifies the hierarchical response structure, and provides context for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: The Industries endpoint returns all the Industries and related sub industries defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption for each industry and each sub industry.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all industries and their related sub-industries defined in WorkBC's Job Board. Returns an array of industry objects, each containing an id, caption, and nested sub-industry objects with their own id and caption. Use this to populate industry filters or reference data for job searches.
data.reasoning: Original summary is a noun phrase rather than action-oriented. Description mentions hierarchical structure but lacks clarity about response format and nesting. Enhanced version specifies the action, clarifies the hierarchical response structure, and provides context for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'post_/jobs' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary is vague and doesn't indicate the search/filter action. Description lacks specificity about input parameters and what constitutes 'supplied criteria'. Enhanced version clarifies the search action, provides examples of expected filter parameters, specifies the response structure, and helps AI agents understand when to use this operation.

data.current_description: The job feed endpoint returns an array of job records that satisfy the supplied criteria.
data.description_suggestion: Searches WorkBC's Job Board for job postings matching the supplied filter criteria. Accepts filter parameters such as region, job type, industry, and major project. Returns an array of job records containing posting details, locations, and employment information. Use this to retrieve filtered job listings based on specific search parameters.
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague and doesn't indicate the search/filter action. Description lacks specificity about input parameters and what constitutes 'supplied criteria'. Enhanced version clarifies the search action, provides examples of expected filter parameters, specifies the response structure, and helps AI agents understand when to use this operation.
